Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label two different habitats, such as one land habitat and one water habitat.
The student can draw at least three different plants and animals in each habitat, showing the diversity of life.
The student can compare and contrast the living things in the two habitats through their drawings.
The student can illustrate patterns in biodiversity by showing how different types of plants and animals are found in different habitats.
